summary: Celal Tan is a well-respected constitutional law professor who lives in a provincial city has two children from his first marriage. Many years after the death of his first wife, he married ... See full summary »
cast: Selçuk Yöntem|Ezgi Mola|Bülent Emin Yarar|Tansu Biçer|Türkü Turan|Güler Ökten|Cengiz Bozkurt|Alpay Sayhan|Köksal Engür|Tugra Kaftancioglu|Ushan Çakir|Gazanfer Ündüz|Yilmaz Gruda|Engin Alpates|Engin Hepileri|Ismail Içen
title: Celal Tan ve Ailesinin Asiri Acikli Hikayesi
